text: Vladimir Aleksandrovich Kirsanov (Russian: Владимир Александрович Кирсанов; 1929–1995) was a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's coxless four where they were eliminated in the semi-final repechage. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Vladimir Kirsanov
